label: 撥鏤
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: A technique used to decorate ivory. First, the ivory is stained red or blue, then it is hairline-engraved, exposing white ivory in the design lines. These white lines might then be colored in with different dyes or pigments.
